title: normalize
extract: Definition of normalize. transitive verb. 1 : to make conform to or reduce to a norm or standard. 2 : to make normal (as by a transformation of variables) 3 : to bring or restore to a normal condition normalize relations between two countries.
extract_html: Definition of normalize. transitive verb. 1 : to make conform to or reduce to a norm or standard. 2 : to make normal (as by a transformation of variables) 3 : to bring or restore to a normal condition normalize relations between two countries.
